title: I Reincarnated As An Evil Duchess - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Child Abuse   Female Protagonist   Gate to Another World   Handsome Male Lead   Multiple POV   Nobles   Poor Protagonist   Reincarnated in Another World   Transmigration   Transported to Another World   Villainess Noble Girls
author: 이니피스
description:
20-year-old, ordinary college student, Kim Min-ha.

It’s absurd to wake up in a completely different world after a sudden accident…

‘Why did a super handsome man come to me with an angry face, and give me divorce papers?’

“What are you talking about, handsome guy? I’ve never met you, let alone married you, why are you handing me a document that’s requesting for a divorce?”

“Stop making excuses and just sign it.” 

What made me more shocked was the information that I found out afterwards.

‘I reincarnated as a Duchess named Minas Persen? That means, that handsome man was my husband, Seth Persen?!’  

Whenever she was bored, she’d bully her servants and abuse her younger brother-in-law emotionally. Now, she got divorced because she was cheating on her husband!

“I have a final request. I want you to listen to what I have to say.” 

“Alright. Tell me, I will give it to you unless it’s alimony.”

“No, it’s not that. Just make sure to prepare a job for me.”

“What?”

‘Even if you’re kicked out, you’ll still have to tend to your own needs!’ That was the first thing that came to her mind when she realized she reincarnated as Minas Persen.

Can she achieve her goals and live?>
